name: Super Blood Warriors
description: After several government-sanctioned experiments, classified under the "Super Warriors" program, an elite class of super-soldiers was created. Experience fast and frantic FPS combat in multiplayer online Deathmatch. Unlock special weapons and abilities by getting kills and scoring damage against opponents.  Choose from classes that suit specific playstyles or mix it up by changing your default loadout. Super Blood Warriors is a passion project that is fun and ridiculous and has more content on the way.
